activities: Brintnall & Nicolini, Inc. in the U.S. receives personal information from the European Union about market research subjects, service providers and business partners, medical and healthcare professionals, industry experts, suppliers, vendors and contractors.  These data are collected and transferred to the U.S. in support of the company’s market research and other business activities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Malta, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities Panel and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
